alert.note: Alert for Eastern Baranof Island and Southern Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 10:44PM AKST until January 01 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Skagway and Dyea, Haines and the Chilkat Peninsula, Gustavus, Hoonah and Tenakee Springs, Pelican, and Angoon. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Friday afternoon through late Friday night. Some mixing with rain is likely near Elfin Cove and Pelican by Saturday morning.
info.instruction: A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
